gist.headline: News about the news
gist.blurb: We've optimized our Discord announcement bot. It's now faster, smarter, and comes with a manual override button for when the hive gets too busy.
gist.summary: Refactored the Discord announcement workflow to allow manual triggers and generate content from PR descriptions instead of raw file diffs.
gist.impact: Reduces API usage and improves the relevance of automated announcements by focusing on intent rather than implementation details.
gist.visual_concept: A pixel art bee adjusting a retro radio broadcasting tower or microphone. Represents the improved announcement system (the 'voice' of the project).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute 8-bit bee adjusting a retro radio broadcasting tower. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes. Pixel text 'ON AIR'. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee adjusting a retro broadcasting antenna with a large red button nearby. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'SIGNAL BOOST'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
